Hello everyone ! We are happy to bring to you an improved Harmonica !
- Unlimited number of matches shown to you daily !
- And no time limit for chatting !
- The overall look of the app has been improved
- We fixed several bugs

Hello everyone ! We are happy to bring to you an improved Harmonica !
- Unlimited number of matches shown to you daily !
- And no time limit for chatting !
- The overall look of the app has been improved
- We fixed several bugs

We regularly make updates to ensure the best possible user experience. Here are a few of the latest features and enhancements:

- New users can verify their identity using selfie verification.
- Bug fixes.

Have a question or idea? Email us at info@harmonica.life.

We regularly make updates to ensure the best possible user experience. Here are a few of the latest features and enhancements:

- New users can verify their identity using selfie verification.
- Bug fixes.

Have a question or idea? Email us at info@harmonica.life.

We regularly make updates to ensure the best possible user experience.
Here are a few of the latest features and enhancements:

- Find matches in your country much faster
- Sign up experience is now much shorter and nicer
- Skip photo upload and explore the app before committing
- See your comments on profiles as icebreakers in the chat
- Loads of bugs crushed

Have questions or suggestions? Email us at info@harmonica.life

Have questions or suggestions? Email us at info@harmonica.life

We regularly make updates to ensure the best possible user experience.
Here are a few of the latest features and enhancements:

Users can like back and start chat in one click.
Users can sign in with Apple.
Marriage goals added to the profile.
Enhanced discovery cards design.
Bug fixes.

Have questions or suggestions? Email us at info@harmonica.life

We regularly make updates to ensure the best possible user experience.
Here are a few of the latest features and enhancements:

- Likes will be refilled every 24 hrs.
- Now you can add your interests to your profile.
- Enhanced discovery experience and better profiles relevance
- Bug fixes.

Have questions or suggestions? Email us at info@harmonica.life

We regularly make updates to ensure the best possible user experience.
Here are a few of the latest features and enhancements:

- Premium users will be able to get more visibility in discovery by using "Boost".
- Premium users will have unlimited likes.
- Users will be able to see the received likes in "See Who likes You list".
- Bug fixes.

Have questions or suggestions? Email us at info@harmonica.life
